import React, { Fragment, useEffect } from 'react' import './App.css' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch } from 'react-router-dom' import Login from './components/LoginRegister/Login' import Register from './components/LoginRegister/Register' import Header from './components/Header/Header' import CategoryBtns from './components/CategoryBtns/CategoryBtns' import Footer from './components/Footer/Footer' import TeachForm from './components/TeachForm/TeachForm' import TeacherProfile from './components/ClassDisplays/TeacherProfile' import LearnByCategory from './components/ClassDisplays/LearnByCategory' import Landing from './components/Landing/Landing' import Alert from './components/LoginRegister/Alert' // Redux import { Provider } from 'react-redux' import store from './store' import { loadUser } from './actions/auth' import setAuthToken from './utils/setAuthToken' if (localStorage.token) { setAuthToken(localStorage.token) } const App = () => { // runs when it's mounted same as componentdidmount useEffect(() => { store.dispatch(loadUser()) }, []) return (
) } export default App
